  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    tage.networking.client.IGameConnectionClient, tage.networking.IGameConnection
    public class ClientProtocol
extends tage.networking.client.GameConnectionClient
    a protocol for handling server communication, as well as ghost avatar and NPC management
